context: repair of left ear laceration deformity y-v plasty 2 cm.
repair of right ear laceration deformity, complex repair 2 cm.
preoperative diagnosis: bilateral ear laceration deformities.
repair of left ear laceration deformity y-v plasty 2 cm.
repair of right ear laceration deformity, complex repair 2 cm.
the marsupialized epithelialized tracts were pared to raw tissue.
the 5-0 chromic sutures were used to approximate anteriorly, posteriorly, and anterior centrifugal edge in the y-v plasty fashion to decrease the risk of notching.
next, attention was turned to the contralateral ear where an elongated laceration deformity was pared of the marsupialized epithelialized edges anteriorly, posteriorly to create raw edges.
the laceration was repaired anteriorly and posteriorly in a pleated fashion to decrease length of the incision and to decrease any deformity toward the edge or any dog-ear deformity toward the edge.
